description: Version 6.4.0 works in Kubuntu 20.04. whatever. Versions 7.whatever don't work in the latest version of Kubuntu, Ubuntu, Suse, etc.; I've spent some hours exploring this. SF makes great videos out of individual images capture via time-lapse technics. Its simple to use and the results are great!
summary: if it Works, don't fix it

description: Never functioned correctly, crashed a lot more than it even began to load.
summary: Did not use it, now I cannot remove it! Don't get it

description: Muito útil para editar fotos e tratar negativos.
After a few minutes waiting for this app to install, with NO progress shown, I canceled. Synaptics pkg manager needed repairs (broken packages) to start removal.
summary: Would not install, needed to repair system to remove remnants

description: Best editor for quick edits. It does everything I need to edit photos. Runs best on KDE o/s, such as Kubuntu. Only very rarely do I use GIMP now.
Never heard of it, although it is a part of Digikam. Excelent editing on intermediate level. It should be linked to Gwenview as well.
TOP. Extremely lightweight
I didnt install it, I did just click on it an now I cant remove it from my pc

Really happy with this piece of open source programming. Selecting newly taken photographs with ease> open in Raw editor automatic is the next step for simpel basic editing. It gives the choice for color ICC workflow. Turning interface into gray is also a big pre !
summary: Best Raw editor once you give it time to explore, easy to use !

description:
Better to open the TERMINAL and write: apt-get install digikam...
Maybe the slow install is because this version IS OUT OF DATE 
---- for your PC/Laptop
RUNS GOOD IN WIN 7 USE IT ALL THE TIME .
Crashes in Kubuntu 21.04 whenever i try to Configure Showfoto in the settings menu. I'll just use digiKam.
Installation broke down somewhere and now I can't uninstall from Xubuntu 20.04. Junky and poorly programmed.
Just dont , trust me.

I appreciate showFoto's robust, straightforward usefulness for "developing" RAW photos--minus the learning curve of the dedicated RAW editors/photo managers. If more refined or creative edits are desired in an app without RAW support, once the RAW file has been edited, the "Save as" option makes that possible. The Free Rotation tool is amazing for precisions corrections (with cropping). The lens correction feature is invaluable as long as the lens (or a close match) is represented. Just an all-around great tool for quickly delivering RAW originals to an editor like GIMP.
not stable ! sometime crashed....

Although many Linux users tend to give one star to an application just because it did not function in their distro, they should consider the actual function of an application. When you do that with this application, you'll discover one of the best, if not the best of its kind. It has all the photo editing functions that are of practical use and they function very accurately. This can only get better.
summary: This is a very good all-around, precise photo edit tool

description: Auf einfache Weise kann man mit diesem Programm mehr aus seinen Bildern herausholen. Beeindruckend sind das Beseitigen perspektivischer Verzerrungen und das Kompensieren von Objektiv-Fehlern. Durch die Einstellung des lokalen Kontrastes werden auch die Farben deutlich hervorgehoben. Das Nachschärfen ist auch eine wichtige Möglichkeit. An die deutschen Bezeichnungen gelangt man durch Herunterladen von DigiCam.
Bin sehr zufrieden ! Danke
hat alles was man braucht ?️. Leichte bedienung, nach kurzem benutzen.
El programa es muy fácil de usar para edición de fotografías y el resultado es excelente.
Es muy buena muy facil de usar y muy util
summary: Es muy buena muy facil de usar y muy util

description: Una aplicación muy buena, recomendada.
Rapide, ergonomique et efficace. À noter qu'il prend en compte les fichiers raw. C'est l'éditeur intégré de Digikam. Mais c'est bien de l'avoir à part pour l'utiliser à partir des menus contextuels.

Требовалось добавить дату на фотографии (да есть приложения для съёмки которые сразу добавляют дату, но в моём случае фотографии уже были сделаны), приложение отлично справилось. Удобный и понятный интерфейс. Что особенно порадовало, так это то, что после первой отредактированной фотографии для всех последующих приложение сразу добавляло текст с датой в нужное место и с правильными настройками шрифта!
